item.title: 600,000 Inquiries, No Waiting
item.description: Purchasing important items can be a hassle, especially telecommunications services. It’s a maze of confusing calls, endless hold music, and tedious forms with long wait times. But imagine getting a price for a T1 line or finding nearby Metro Ethernet services in under a minute, any time, day or night. That’s where GeoQuote (tm) comes in. This innovative telecom pricing application is changing how businesses buy voice and data services.
